title: Buy mounting brackets and dozer rakes at discounted prices in the Dallas area
text: Buy mounting brackets and dozer rakes at discounted prices in the Dallas area USA, 19 October 2015 -- If you are looking to buy technical equipment like dozer rakes and mounting brackets, then you should get in touch with Randal Steelman, the owner of DozerRakes.com.If you are looking to buy technical equipment like dozer rakes and mounting brackets, then you should get in touch with Randal Steelman, the owner of http://www.dozerrakes.com . Our company specializes in the manufacturing and sales of root rakes for bulldozers and we are also able to provide mounting brackets for your purchase. Any size of rake is available on our website andif you are looking for standard size rakes then you can buy 8 foot or 10 foot rakes from us or place an order for a customized length. Our 8 foot root rakes start at $1950 and 10 foot rakes start at $2250. If you are resident of the Dallas or Houston area then you can choose pick up service as well on our website. There is a nominal shipping charge for standard rakes if you choose not to pick it up, and that varies from $250 to $350 depending on the size. Once you place an order with usto buy your first rake, you can expect special rates in the future for buying a mounting bracket. We have years of experience in selling these rakes. It doesn’t matter what size dozer or loader you are trying to outfit, you will be able to get the best rake for your needs. All of the rakes manufactured by the company use very high quality materials in their construction and they have a warranty to cover them as well on . We have built our business by being one of the premier choices in the area for root rakes. If you are looking to buy rake mounting brackets for your root rake then all you have to do is talk to us and discuss your priorities for us to get started, and when we’re done you will get a great solution to your mounting bracket needs. If you are looking for a root rake for bulldozer them you have come to the best place to get one. Visit our website now at http://www.dozerrakes.comto learn more. Contact Details: 306 Lynge Dr Allen, TX 75013 United States
